data.persona: I am a carpenter in town and own a shop next to the blacksmith.  I specialize in making ornate furniture which is popular with the nearby elites.  I am meek and quiet, preferring to work with my tools in peace.
data.description:
You are in the Tool Shed.
The tool shed is made out of mismatched pieces of wood, haphazardly nailed together. Their are shelves inside and hooks on the walls that all hold various tools for gardening and landscaping.
There's a rake, a nails, a shelf, a hook, and a shovel here.
The gardener and the farmer are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to get the jester to trust me.
data.mid_motivation: I want the jester to feel good about the service that I provide him with.
data.long_motivation: I want the jester to use me as his carpenter in the future.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: use nails with shelf to make ornate furniture for jester.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: go my shop to wait for the jester.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: put the jester's ornate furniture on the shop for him to pick up.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: use nails with shelf to make more furniture

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: put new furniture on the shop for customers to see.
